message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between Sodium Chloride (NaCl) and Silver Nitrate (AgNO3) that produces solid Silver Chloride (AgCl) and aqueous Sodium Nitrate (NaNO3)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between Sodium Chloride (NaCl) and Silver Nitrate (AgNO3) that produces solid Silver Chloride (AgCl) and aqueous Sodium Nitrate (NaNO3) is:

NaCl(aq) + AgNO3(aq) â†’ AgCl(s) + NaNO3(aq)
